has_unlocked_three_hole_course: has_unlocked_classic_a or has_unlocked_classic_b or has_unlocked_classic_c or has_unlocked_resort_a or has_unlocked_resort_b or has_unlocked_resort_c or has_unlocked_special
has_unlocked_three_hole_course_fg: has_unlocked_classic_a_fg or has_unlocked_classic_b_fg or has_unlocked_classic_c_fg or has_unlocked_resort_a_fg or has_unlocked_resort_b_fg or has_unlocked_resort_c_fg or has_unlocked_special_fg
has_unlocked_one_stage: has_unlocked_around_the_island or has_unlocked_to_the_beach or has_unlocked_across_the_bridge or has_unlocked_over_talon_rock or has_unlocked_up_the_volcano or has_unlocked_into_maku_wuhu
